name: test_e2e_with_logs[561_AUTH_DOUBLE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `AUTH_DOUBLE_001` |
| **Name** | Double slash path bypass |
| **Category** | AUTH_BYPASS |
| **Subcategory** | double_slash |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `//admin`
- **Encoded**: `%2F%2Fadmin`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~3000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:56.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
